targets.rawSql: SELECT tr.ts AS time, p.external_id AS metric, tr.value FROM timeseries_readings tr JOIN points p ON tr.point_id = p.id WHERE $__timeFilter(tr.ts) ORDER BY tr.ts
SELECT tr.ts AS time, tr.value FROM timeseries_readings tr JOIN points p ON tr.point_id = p.id WHERE p.external_id = '$point' AND $__timeFilter(tr.ts) ORDER BY tr.ts

list.name: point
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT external_id FROM points ORDER BY external_id
